class.name: TabContainer
class.description: Tabbed Container. Contains several children controls, but shows only one at the same time. Clicking on the top tabs allows to change the currently visible one. Children controls of this one automatically.

method.name: are_tabs_visible
method.description: Return whether the tabs should be visible or hidden.

method.name: get_current_tab
method.description: Return the current tab that is being showed.

method.name: get_tab_align
method.description: Return tab alignment, from the ALIGN_* enum.

method.name: get_tab_title
method.description: Return the title for the tab. Tab titles are by default the children node name, but this can be overridden.

method.name: set_current_tab
method.description: Bring a tab (and the Control it represents) to the front, and hide the rest.

method.name: set_tab_align
method.description: Set tab alignment, from the ALIGN_* enum. Moves tabs to the left, right or center.

method.name: set_tab_icon
method.description: Set an icon for a tab.

method.name: set_tab_title
method.description: Set a title for the tab. Tab titles are by default the children node name, but this can be overridden.

method.name: set_tabs_visible
method.description: Set whether the tabs should be visible or hidden.

signal.name: tab_changed
signal.description: Emitted when the current tab changes.
